html: From historic fire borrowing & forestry reforms to providing key funding for the INL, & getting our military a well deserved pay raise, Idaho saw a number of legislative successes in 2018. I'm committed to building on those in 2019. May each of you have a happy and safe new year
text:
From historic fire borrowing & forestry reforms to providing key funding for the INL, & getting our military a well deserved pay raise, Idaho saw a number of legislative successes in 2018. I'm committed to building on those in 2019. 
May each of you have a happy and safe new year

html: As we ring in a new year I am anxious to get back to work and address some of the urgent issues our nation is facing. While I recognize there is much to be done, I am mindful of the great accomplishments that we had in 2018.

html: Today @POTUS signed an Executive Order on forest management - good news for @forestservice, @Interior & state, local & tribal governments. Empowers us to more effectively clear excess fuels in forests to mitigate future severe wildfires. My statement:https://bit.ly/2EIkyd5
text:
Today @POTUS signed an Executive Order on forest management - good news for @forestservice, @Interior & state, local & tribal governments. Empowers us to more effectively clear excess fuels in forests to mitigate future severe wildfires.

html: From her scrappy demeanor and no-frills style to her boundless passion for family, literacy and freedom, Barbara Bush was America at its best. Her children were blessed to call her mother; our country blessed to call her First Lady. She’ll live on in the heart of our Nation.
text: From her scrappy demeanor and no-frills style to her boundless passion for family, literacy and freedom, Barbara Bush was America at its best.  Her children were blessed to call her mother; our country blessed to call her First Lady. She’ll live on in the heart of our Nation.

html: .....her own service to this country will live on through her legacy of advancing family literacy. She was a role model for all Americans and will be greatly missed.

to prevent catastrophic fires.
